long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can perform following operations:

1. Paste column, choose separator (default: comma) and change column to separated values.

2. Paste separated values and change separators to new lines creating column.

3. Paste column, type someting into separator field and add this at the start of each line.

4. Paste column and delete duplicates.

5. Paste some data and replace single or multiple letters, numbers and special characters.

6. After performing every operation the result will be shown in the second textarea and will be automatically copied to clipboard.

7. Clear first textarea with one click

8. And maybe much more...
